properties.query:
SOURCE '${aws_cloudwatch_cloudtrail_log_group}' | filter @logStream = '${account_id}_CloudTrail_${aws_region}'



 | filter eventName = 'BatchGetImage'



 | fields @timestamp, @message



 | stats count(*) as apiCalls by userIdentity.accountId as accountId,

requestParameters.repositoryName as repository
| sort accountId desc
properties.title: Images per Accounts

properties.query:
SOURCE '${aws_cloudwatch_cloudtrail_log_group}' | filter @logStream = '${account_id}_CloudTrail_${aws_region}'







 | filter eventName = 'BatchGetImage'







 | fields @timestamp, @message







 | stats count_distinct(requestParameters.repositoryName) as Images by
userIdentity.accountId as accountId


| sort Images desc
properties.title: Usage by Accounts

properties.query:
SOURCE '${aws_cloudwatch_cloudtrail_log_group}' | filter @logStream = '${account_id}_CloudTrail_${aws_region}'







 | filter eventName = 'BatchGetImage'







 | fields @timestamp, @message







 | stats count_distinct(userIdentity.accountId) as Accounts by requestParameters.repositoryName as imageName 


| sort Accounts desc
properties.title: ECR Repositories Usage

properties.query:
SOURCE '${aws_cloudwatch_cloudtrail_log_group}' | filter @logStream = '${account_id}_CloudTrail_${aws_region}'



 | filter eventName = 'BatchGetImage'



 | fields @timestamp, @message



 | stats count(*) as apiCalls by userIdentity.accountId as accountId,

requestParameters.repositoryName as repository, coalesce(requestParameters.imageIds.0.imageTag, requestParameters.imageIds.0.imageDigest) as tag
| sort accountId desc
properties.title: Images and tags per accounts
